## Documentation Issue Type
- [ ] Typo or grammatical error
- [ ] Incorrect information
- [ ] Unclear explanation
- [ ] Missing information
- [ ] Outdated content
- [ ] Broken link
- [ ] Code example doesn't work
- [ ] Other

## Location
**Which document has the issue?**
- File: [e.g., README.md, QUICKSTART.md]
- Section: [e.g., Installation, Configuration]
- Line number (if applicable): [e.g., Line 45]

## Description
**What's wrong with the documentation?**
A clear description of the issue.

Paste the current problematic content here

**How should it be corrected?**
Provide your suggestion for improvement.

Add any other context about the documentation issue here.

## Impact
- [ ] Critical - Prevents users from using the software
- [ ] High - Causes confusion for most users
- [ ] Medium - Could be clearer
- [ ] Low - Minor improvement
